m1.title: Module 1: Strategic Role of Customer Service
m1.overlay: Complete Module 1 to unlock these quizzes

q1.text: Question 1: Which alternative best represents the strategic role of Customer Service?

options.a: A) Answer calls and register complaints.
options.b: B) Solve specific problems without impact on company image.
options.c: C) Represent the company's voice in direct contact with the customer and strengthen brand reputation.
options.d: D) Act only when other sectors can't resolve demands.

q1.feedback: Correct Answer! CS is the company's voice and strengthens brand reputation.

q2.text: Question 2: Which activity below is not part of Customer Service responsibilities?

options.b: B) Data organization and report preparation.
options.c: C) Definition of consumer protection laws.
options.d: D) Proposing improvements to scripts and service standards.

q2.feedback: Correct Answer! CS follows laws, but the government (Legislature) defines them.

q3.text: Question 3 (True or False): The correct registration of the service category directly influences the customer response deadline.
q3.feedback: Correct Answer! The system calculates the deadline based on the registered category.

m2.title: Module 2: Where to find information?
m2.overlay: Complete Module 2 to unlock these quizzes

q1.text: Question 1: To look up address, opening hours and contact methods of stores, the agent should access:

options.b: B) The Intranet ‚Üí Branches ‚Üí Registration data and schedules.

q1.feedback: Correct Answer! The Intranet is the official and safe source.

q2.text: Question 2: Mastering information queries on the Intranet contributes to:

options.c: C) Ensuring agility, assertiveness and better customer experience.

q2.feedback: Correct Answer! Happy customer is a customer served with agility and accuracy.

q3.text: Question 3: What's the correct sequence for the customer to start receiving offers via WhatsApp?

options.a: A) Access website ‚Üí choose products ‚Üí register phone.
options.b: B) Select store ‚Üí access community via link or QR Code ‚Üí receive offers.
options.c: C) Contact CS ‚Üí request registration ‚Üí wait for confirmation.
options.d: D) Download exclusive app ‚Üí create login ‚Üí accept terms.

q3.feedback: Correct Answer! Simple and direct: Store -> QR Code/Link -> Offers.

m3.title: Module 3: CDC and Legislation
m3.overlay: Complete Module 3 to unlock these quizzes

q1.text: Question 1: Why is knowledge of Consumer Protection Code essential for those working in CS?

options.a: A) Only to comply with legal requirements.
options.b: B) To respond with confidence, avoid rework and convey credibility to the customer.
options.c: C) To replace company internal policies.
options.d: D) Only to handle formal complaints.

q1.feedback: Correct Answer! Knowledge generates confidence and credibility.

q2.text: Question 2 (True or False): Exchange of products without defect at physical store is a right guaranteed by Consumer Protection Code.
q2.feedback: Correct Answer! It's a commercial policy (courtesy), not law.

q3.text: Question 3: The right of withdrawal allows the customer to:

options.a: A) Exchange any product bought at physical store within 7 days.
options.b: B) Cancel an online purchase within 7 calendar days after receipt.
options.c: C) Request refund only for defective products.
options.d: D) Demand immediate exchange without analysis.

q3.feedback: Correct Answer! Exclusive for purchases made outside the commercial establishment (online/phone).

q4.text: Question 4 (Final Summary): After completing the course, which alternative best summarizes the role of Customer Service?

options.b: B) Answer calls and register information.
options.c: C) Act strategically, with humanity and aligned with legislation, strengthening customer experience and brand reputation.
options.d: D) Forward demands to other sectors.

q4.feedback: Correct Answer! You captured the essence of Customer Service! üëèüëèüëè
